---
title: "Introduction"
---

Systematic Literature Review (SLR) has become more increasingly popular among researchers. This type of research refers to a systematic process of obtaining reliable literature to be analyze and synthesize *accurately*. What differentiate this type of literature review to traditional one is that SLR emphasize on systematicity, which means that all process in SLR research is reproducable. 


SLR is significant for some reasons. First, it helps summarize the results of previous studies on a particular topic. The results of studies can be summarize into several themes, which reveal what we already know about centain phenomenon.
